title: Add epic management UI (create, edit, delete)
description:
Complete epic CRUD operations in plugin UI.

**Current:** No way to create, edit, or delete epics from UI.

**Required:**
- CreateEpicDialog.kt (form: title, description, architectureNotes, rails)
- Edit epic via dialog (reuse CreateEpicDialog)
- Delete epic with confirmation
- "+" button in epic row header
- Right-click context menu on epic chips
definitionOfDone: Can create new epics from UI

implementationPlan.description: Update EpicDetailDialog.kt to include architectureNotes and epicRails fields. Use JBTable for list displays (epic rails). Support filtering and sorting in all list views. Real-time updates via WebSocket subscriptions already in place.
Add Delete button to EpicDetailDialog with confirmation dialog
Add deleteEpic method to MoeProjectService.kt to send DELETE_EPIC WebSocket message
Add DELETE_EPIC message handler to WebSocketServer.ts in daemon to call state.deleteEpic
Add deleteEpic method to StateManager.ts to remove epic file and emit EPIC_DELETED event
